= XML-RPC API to Seattle GENI =

[[BR]]

=== acquire_resources(num, type) ===
----

Acquires num resources of type. Returns a list of nodeip:nmport:vesselid strings indicating which vessels were acquired.

[[BR]]
=== release_resources(which) ===
----

Release resources associated with an account. If which is an empty list then it release all resources associated with an account.

=== get_resource_info() ===
----

Returns a list resources currently associated with this account.

[[BR]]
=== get_account_info() ===
----

Returns a dict of account information for the account. This includes the user's port number, name, URL for installers, if the private key exists, total vessels allowed, and the user's affiliation.


[[BR]]
=== get_public_key() ===
----

Returns the user's public key.

[[BR]]
=== get_private_key() ===
----

Returns the user's private key.   Raises an exception if the key was removed.

[[BR]]
=== delete_private_key() ===
----
Removes the user's private key from the server.
